description:
This course covers concepts and tools for the management and analysis of data. Data management principles and concepts are developed using relational database software (Microsoft Access). Data manipulation; descriptive analyses and interpretation are introduced using SAS and Stata. 
This course is part of the Biostatistics Collaboration of Australia. If you are not enrolled in a Biostatistics program at UQ, please contact the Program Director, Dr Mark Jones, to seek permission before enrolling.
